title: Crack in the Road Exclusive Mix #7: Teenage Reverb
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/crackmix7.jpg "crackmix7")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/6258-crack-in-the-road-exclusive-mix-7-teenage-reverb/attachment/crackmix7)

Artwork by [Van Robinson](http://www.flickr.com/photos/vanorits/)

Since **Crack in the Road** had the pleasure of chatting with **Teenage Reverb** all those months ago, he’s been continuing to turn heads with his seamless blending of genres. Take his two releases so far, ‘Summit Demos’ and ‘Isolation Tape Night’, two collections of music that do their best never to wallow in a particular sound or texture. His work still manages to hold a continuous theme however, the songs invoking a sense of forced delirium, whether **Reverb** is experimenting with chillwave or shoegaze.

His Mixtape for **Crack in the Road** wears that philosophy on its sleeve, jumping from dreamy instrumental hip-hop to the rather disturbing Rn’B of **The Weeknd**. It’s a great listen and a fantastic addition to our Exclusive mix series. Check out the exclusive mix bellow and why not download his latest mixtape while your at it?

[Crack In The Road Exclusive Mix #7: Teenage Reverb](http://www.mixcloud.com/crackintheroad/crack-in-the-road-exclusive-mix-7-teenage-reverb/?utm_source=widget&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=base_links&utm_term=cloudcast_link) by [Crackintheroad](http://www.mixcloud.com/crackintheroad/?utm_source=widget&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=base_links&utm_term=profile_link) on [Mixcloud](http://www.mixcloud.com/?utm_source=widget&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=base_links&utm_term=homepage_link)
